import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { data : '' } componentDidMount() { let id = this.props.match.params.vid axios.get(`https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/${id}`) .then((response) => { this.setState({ data : response.data }) }) } render() { return (
) } } export default PlayerSection
